title: Atlanta Rapper T-Hood Killed In Domestic-Related Shooting: Police
description: Rapper T-Hood, who was reportedly dating the daughter of known Atlanta hip-hop artist Rasheeda Frost, died in a shooting, cops say.
content:
Gwinnett County Police on Monday identified Hood as the 33-year-old man killed in the shooting, which occurred around 7 p.m. Friday at a home. A 911 caller told dispatch that a dispute had taken place and that a man had been shot, police said.

First responders took Hood to a local hospital, where he died of his injuries, police said. An unnamed person was detained on scene, but police did not release any possible charges in the case. Officers are investigating the shooting as a homicide, police said.

Hood, of "Perculator" fame, was reportedly dating the daughter of Atlanta's own Kirk and Rasheeda Frost. The Frosts, entrepreneurs and "Love and Hip-Hop: Atlanta" cast members, were first known as part of Atlanta's rap scene in the late 1990s and early 2000s. Their daughter, Kelsie Frost, was Hood's girlfriend and was the focal point of rumors surrounding his death, the Shade Room reported.

"Just come get me baby please…..🙏 I can’t even type this. I love you papa. I can’t wait to hold you again," read one of her Instagram posts on Monday, which included photos and video clips of she and Hood. Per Shade Room on Sunday, Kelsie Frost expressed not wanting to hurt Hood in an Instagram post, which appears to no longer be shared.

“I can’t sit back and let this narrative being created go on. The love of my life is GONE. I am sick to my stomach. I don’t wish this on anyone. I don’t even have time to grieve or say my respects in the right manner because I am defending myself, being attacked by the people who are creating weird and sick rumors. ... Y’all hear pick and choose what you want but I didn’t want this, ask for it, call for it, set up ask for anything I WOULD NEVER!!!!!!! Stop playing on my name real ones know, he wouldn’t approve!!!!!” A motive in the deadly shooting is unknown. ALSO SEE: Get The Latest Local News (For Free!) With One Quick Tap
summary: Atlanta rapper T-Hood has been identified as the 33-year-old man killed in a domestic-related shooting. The shooting occurred around 7 p.m. Friday at a home and was reported to have taken to a local hospital where he died of his injuries. An unnamed person was detained at the scene but no charges have been released. T-hood was reportedly dating the daughter of Atlanta's Kirk and Rasheeda Frost, who was the subject of rumors surrounding his death. The motive for the shooting is unknown.
shortSummary: Police in Gwinnett County identified 33-year-old rapper T-Hood as dead; he was killed in a domestic dispute involving his girlfriend Kelsie Frost.

scraped_sources.text:
Kirk Frost’s daughter, Kelsie Frost, is speaking out after her boyfriend, rapper, T Hood, passed away. Police reported that T Hood, formerly Telvin Hood, died from gunshot wounds on Friday, August 8, after an alleged dispute outside his home in Georgia. Once news of his death hit the internet, folks started questioning if Kelsie had a hand in his murder, now she’s addressing the rumors.
RELATED: Social Media Is Sharing Words For Rasheeda After She Dropped A Few Bars About Never Leaving Kirk Frost (WATCH)
Details On T Hood’s Tragic Passing
WSBTV reports police rushed to a Georgia home on August 8 after a gunfire dispute. When officers arrived, they found a man who had been shot. They rushed him to the hospital, but he died from injuries. T Hood’s family later identified him as the victim, Channel 2 Action News reports. Per Us Weekly officials are investigating the motive for the shooting and have detained one person that was reportedly at the scene.
Kirk Frost’s Daughter Kelsie Addresses Rumors Surrounding Boyfriend T Hood’s Death
After news of T Hood’s passing broke, rumors started swirling online, claiming his girlfriend — Kirk Frost’s daughter, Kelsie played a role. However, Kelsie quickly jumped on Instagram to set the record straight with a lengthy message.
“I can’t sit back and let this narrative being created go on. The love of my life is GONE. I am sick to my stomach. I don’t wish this on anyone. I don’t even have time to grieve or say my respects in the right manner because I am defending myself, being attacked by the people who are creating weird and sick rumors,” Kelsie Frost wrote.
Kelsie also told folks to stop believing rumors because she’s completely heartbroken over losing her man. She also shared that before he died, he was reportedly recovering from being shot three times, but they kept that private.
“I didn’t harm him or ask anyone to harm him!!! I didn’t ask for this. I would NEVER!” she continued.
Finally, Kelsie Frost ended by saying that she would never put T Hood in a harmful situation. Furthermore, she said real ones close them know he would never let people play with her name like this.
“Y’all hear pick and choose what you want but I didn’t want this, ask for it, call for it, set up ask for anything I WOULD NEVER!!!!!!! Stop playing on my name real ones know, he wouldn’t approve!!!!!”
Social Media Reacts To Kelsie’s Message & T Hood’s Passing
Folks over in The Shade Room’s comment section sent Kelsie and T Hood’s family condolences. See some of their reactions below.
Instagram user @jeliroleearthwalker wrote, “This is sad….. blessing to his family and friends 🙏🏾💯”
Instagram user @rjay.k wrote, “Y’all did PNB Rock’s gf the same way then the details came out that it was set up from the beginning im not believing nothing until the evidence comes out.”
While Instagram user @lovelyy_denise wrote, “Omg breaks my heart yo that’s the worst feeling ever losing the love of your life 🥹”
Then Instagram user @daddyyreej wrote, “LONG LIVE T-HOOD.”
Another Instagram user @alannamilan wrote, “the police access phone records like water this will all be figured out n no time let’s let them do their job and the family grieve 🫂”
Instagram user @jamarijonesatl wrote, “Sad folks gotta die to finally make these bigger platforms smh … Love you forever @hatershatethood2.”
Then another Instagram user @b2_legit wrote, “People really just don’t know how to say off the internet 🤦🏽♀️🤦🏽♀️”
Finally, Instagram user @boujee_gangsta wrote, “I’m for her 🙌talk to God girly . Safe and peaceful recovery . ❤️🩹 they gon do that cus u was his gf it never fails … it’s ridiculous.”

argos_summary: Gwinnett County Police have identified 33-year-old rapper T Hood, also known as Telvin Hood, as the victim of a fatal shooting that occurred during a dispute at his home. He was taken to a local hospital but succumbed to his injuries. His girlfriend, Kelsie Frost, daughter of reality TV stars Kirk and Rasheeda Frost, has publicly denied rumors suggesting her involvement in his death, expressing her heartbreak and frustration over the speculation surrounding the incident. The police are investigating the shooting as a homicide and have detained one person at the scene.
